thread.title: Super Happy Shopper
thread.title_full: Mastershoe reviewed by Super Happy Shopper

author: Super Happy Shopper
title: Super Happy Shopper
text: Been searching for a specific pair of shoes that are no longer made and found them on Mastershoe's website. Quickly ordered them and thought it would take a week to get at the shortest since they were being shipped all the way to California. Within 2 days they were by my front door. Never had such a smooth experience ordering online and getting my order so quickly without requesting a rush delivery.
